pageProps.title: About
pageProps.body:
The author of the blog is [Anurag Ashok][1].

I am a software developer primarily focused on Java-based microservices.  I am currently also exploring the javascript ecosystem for web development. I am [lazy in repetitive tasks][2] and choose automation. I love all things code, and am very passionate about "[everything as code][3]"

I live by the these quotes from famous software craftsmen :

> Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand. 
> 
> ― Martin Fowler

> It is not enough for code to work. 
> 
> Truth can only be found in one place: the code.
> 
> ― Robert C. Martin

I feel that tutorials are great, but building projects is the best way to learn.  I could have created this blog using wordpress or jekyll. Instead, I  built the blog [from scratch][4] and made it a learning project. I can now learn from tutorials and apply it to the blog. The blog project can be a journal of the learnings as well. Also, nothing beats the joy of making things work with code! 

In my quest to learn, I will use tools and tech that this simple blog site may not even need. Hence, this site is definitely, going to be "__over-engineered__". 

I love feedback. [Let me know][5] if you have any. Thanks!

P.S. Inspirations!
- [https://ponyfoo.com/articles/most-over-engineered-blog-ever][6]
- [https://jlongster.com/Presenting-The-Most-Over-Engineered-Blog-Ever][7]
